title: Latest updates: Nottinghamshire Live on Wednesday 1 March 2017 - BBC News
summary: investigation into death of boy , 13 , in bramcote .
man found dead at block of flats .
three companies set to bid to run rail franchise .
funeral of sir peter mansfield takes place .
evans beaten by monfils in dubai .
news , sport , travel and weather updates resume at 08:00 thursday .

documents.title: our live coverage across the day
text: our live updates have now ended and will return tomorrow from 08:00 .

documents.title: weather : rain and some snow overnight
text: outbreaks of rain will spread in from the south through the evening .
rain will be heavy at points and could turn to snow for a time but mainly over high ground .
minimum temperature of 2c ( 36f ) .
author: Lucy Martin
BBC Weather

documents.title: 'intelligent ' squad pleases nolan
text: i wonder if kevin nolan will now be sending all of his players for iq tests ?
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC Local Live

documents.title: nolan : county 's revival down to intelligent players
text: manager kevin nolan has said notts county 's remarkable revival is down to having intelligent players who learn quickly .
the magpies had lost 10 league two games in a row when nolan was .
appointed on 12 january .
and were just one point and one place above the bottom two .
but the .
win at second-placed plymouth argyle .
was their fourth in nine games under nolan and took them eight points clear of the relegation zone .
author: BBC Sport

documents.title: breakingnottinghamshire medic killed working for is
text: a medic , originally from nottinghamshire , who was part of a large group of students who left his studies in sudan to join so-called islamic state , has been killed in iraq .
the bbc .
understands that hisham fadlallah died at the weekend .
author: Steve Swann
BBC Home Affairs Correspondent

documents.title: woman arrested after death of boy , 13 , in bramcote
text: nottinghamshire police said it was still trying to work out the circumstances surrounding the teenager 's death following the incident in bramcote .
a 36-year-old woman was arrested on sus of supplying a controlled drug and was further arrested in custody on sus of causing grievous bodily harm .
she has since been released on bail .
another boy , 14 , who was also at the property on sloan drive on monday , remains in hospital in a stable condition .
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC Local Live

documents.title: breakinginvestigation into death of boy , 13 , in bramcote
text: an investigation has begun into the death of a 13-year-old boy following an incident at a property in bramcote .
nottinghamshire police were called to a property on sloan drive in the early hours of monday .
the teenager died last night .
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC Local Live

documents.title: medals of wwi soldier william peniston fetch £ 14,000
text: the medals of a world war one soldier who was decorated for gallantry three times in three weeks - probably without firing a shot - have sold at auction for £ 14,000 .
nottinghamshire miner william peniston joined the kings royal rifle corps and became a stretcher bearer .
the collection was expected to fetch between £ 8,000 and £ 10,000 .
author: Greig Watson
BBC News Online reporter

documents.title: recycling site changes location
text: some exciting household waste related news for residents of east leake
east leake recyclers : the gotham road recycling site has now closed .
but good news , it 's moved to the co-op car park on main street instead
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC Local Live

documents.title: your photos : march across nottinghamshire
text: weather watcher steve a was up nice and early in kimberley to capture this morning 's sunrise .
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC Local Live

documents.title: man found dead at block of flats
text: the body of a 33-year-old man has been found in a flat in russell street , radford .
nottinghamshire police said chemicals were found in the property and the block of flats was evacuated as a precaution .
the man 's death was not being treated as sus the force said .
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC Local Live

documents.title: monfils ends evans ' run in dubai
text: dan evans ' run at the dubai international is over after he was knocked out by fourth seed gael monfils in three sets .
evans , who trains at the nottingham tennis centre , lost 4-6 , 6-3 , 1-6 in 95 minutes .
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC Local Live

documents.title: funeral of sir peter mansfield takes place
text: family , friends and former colleagues of sir peter mansfield have attended the 83-year-old 's funeral at st. john 's church in beeston .
the scientist , who was the `` pioneer '' of mri , passed away last month .
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC Local Live

documents.title: ice hockey : panthers player handed ban
text: nottingham panthers forward robert farmer has been handed a five-game ban after an incident in the weekend 's game against belfast .
he will miss matches against braehead clan , belfast giants ( x2 ) , dundee stars and edinburgh capitals .
author: BBC Nottingham Sport

documents.title: university stands still to remember mri 'pioneer ' sir peter mansfield
text: the university of nottingham has sent across these photos of staff and students on campus paying their final respects to sir peter mansfield .
sir peter , who is the scientist that developed mri scans , died last month and his funeral was held earlier today in beeston .
the 83-year-old spent his entire career at the university of nottingham and has a building named after him there .
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC Local Live

documents.title: weather : blustery afternoon ahead
text: the skies will turn increasingly cloudy from the south this afternoon , accompanied by a brisk south-westerly wind .
maximum temperatures of 9c ( 48f ) .
author: Sara Blizzard
BBC Weather

documents.title: stroke patient died after surgery denial 'over lack of beds '
text: a woman died after a hospital did not accept her for neurosurgery citing an intensive care bed shortage , an inquest heard .
teresa dennett , 58 , needed surgery after a stroke and the coroner concluded `` it is likely she would have survived '' if the operation went ahead .
nottingham university hospitals said its intensive care unit was full and suggested she should go to sheffield .
but nhs england said a lack of beds was not a reason for refusing admission .
author: Caroline Lowbridge
BBC News Online

documents.title: sir peter mansfield 's funeral cortege passes through university
text: university of nottingham 's press office tweets
students and staff @ twitterid pay their respects to nobel laureate sir peter mansfield as his funeral cortege passes by .
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC Local Live

documents.title: watch : why james taylor 'still ca n't trust his heart '
text: ex-nottinghamshire and england batsman james taylor , who retired last year with a heart condition , has said he is learning to trust his heart again after having an internal defibrillator surgically fitted
author: BBC Sport

documents.title: your photos : march across nottinghamshire
text: thanks to bbc weather watcher david e for getting in touch with this stunning sunrise on the river trent near shelford .
it also should n't be too long before we have a few more leaves on those trees as well
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC Local Live

documents.title: evans set for monfils test in dubai
text: nottingham-based dan evans is back in action at the dubai tennis championships later when he takes on world number 12 gael monfils .
evans , 26 , who trains at the nottingham tennis centre , beat dustin brown on tuesday to book his place in the last 16 .
a win for evans over monfils would see him play either roberto bautista agut or fernando verdasco in the quarter finals .
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC Local Live

documents.title: stab victims 'being stitched back up by vets , ' youth worker says
text: some stabbing victims are paying veterinarians to treat their injuries , according to youth workers in nottingham .
the victims are reluctant to go to hospital because they do not want to the police to know they were stabbed .
nottingham boxing coach marcellus baz ( who also runs knife crime workshops , said he knows of several victims locally who have been `` stitched up '' by vets .
the royal college of veterinary surgeons said it could not confirm if it had complaints about vets treating stab wounds due to confidentiality .
author: Jeremy Ball
BBC East Midlands Today social affairs correspondent

documents.title: have you registered to vote ?
text: rushcliffe borough council tweets
i do n't want you turning up at the ballot booth on 4 may and being disappointed .
the @ twitterid # localelections are on 4 may .
make sure you register to vote # yourvotematters
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC Local Live

documents.title: three companies set to bid for east midlands rail franchise
text: three companies have qualified for the chance to bid to run the east midlands rail franchise , the department for transport has announced .
arriva rail east midlands , first trenitalia east midlands rail and stagecoach east midlands trains are the three companies looking to run the services from november 2018 .
each company will soon be invited to bid and they will then be assessed for what passenger benefits they offer and whether they represent value for money .
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC Local Live

documents.title: final farewell for sir peter mansfield
text: the funeral of mri `` pioneer '' sir peter mansfield will take place at st. john 's church in beeston later ( 12:00 ) .
the cortege .
will pass through the university of nottingham 's park between 11:15-12:00 .
the 83-year-old spent his whole career at the university and has had a building named after him on the campus .
the funeral cortege for sir peter mansfield will pass through uni park tomorrow between 11.15am-12noon
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC Local Live

documents.title: magpies supporters bus still travelling back at 03:30am
text: nottingham post writer leigh curtis tweets
unreal dedication from those notts fans last night .
m5 was shut in two places on way back .
supporters ' bus still travelling gone 3:30am .
i go to aways when i can but the 167 that went last night .
total respect .
looking forward to player ratings !
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC Local Live

documents.title: watch : east midlands weather outlook
text: here is my weather forecast for wednesday
author: Sara Blizzard
BBC Weather

documents.title: region 's sides return from lengthy trips
text: i suspect there 'll be a few bleary eyes in offices this morning after what were 500 and 400-mile round trips for notts county and mansfield last night
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC Local Live

documents.title: evans ' stags held by yeovil
text: elsewhere - mansfield are a point outside the play-off places following a goalless draw at yeovil town .
steve evans ' side are on the road again on saturday , when they face cheltenham town .
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC Local Live

documents.title: magpies topple promoting chasing argyle
text: notts county moved eight points clear of the league two relegation places with a 1-0 win at second placed plymouth last night .
jorge grant 's goal means county are now unbeaten in five matches .
author: BBC Sport

documents.title: auction medals reveal soldier 's great war bravery
text: oliver pepys , the auctioneer who will be putting william peniston 's medals under the hammer , has said that the soldier 's back story makes this lot interesting .
`` it is a very exciting group , '' mr pepys said .
`` he is one of only a few recipients to receive four gallantry awards during the great war and what is nice is three of them were awarded over three weeks . ''
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC Local Live

documents.title: medals of 'remarkable ' wwi soldier set for auction
text: the medals of a wwi soldier who was decorated for gallantry three times in three weeks - probably without firing a shot - are set to be auctioned .
nottinghamshire miner william peniston joined the kings royal rifle corps and became a stretcher bearer .
the `` remarkable '' collection is set to go under .
the hammer in london .
with a guide price of £ 8,000-£ 10,000 .
author: Greig Watson
BBC News Online reporter

documents.title: good morning : welcome to today 's live updates
text: good morning and welcome along to wednesday across nottinghamshire .
i 'll be with you until later with the region 's news , sport , weather and travel .
if you would like to share your and stories then please get in touch via email , facebook or twitter .
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC Local Live
